content.text: Hi, I want to source an item. Candle making material - molds wicks colours fragrances waxes jars

content.thinking: Candle making supplies - this could be a business or personal/hobby project. I need to qualify quickly while showing expertise first.

content.text:
Hey! Candle supplies ‚Äî that's a popular category we work with. üïØÔ∏è

Quick question so I can point you in the right direction: are you making candles for a brand/business, or is this more of a personal project?

Just asking because for business orders (usually 100+ units per item), we can get you great factory pricing. For smaller hobby quantities, local suppliers tend to make more sense since shipping costs from Asia add up fast.
Brother i m new beginner and student. May i cannot purchase in bulk but 25 to 35 wicks some candle jars like 10 to 15 different molds. Candle fragrances of approx 20 to 30 ml

Thanks for being upfront ‚Äî I appreciate that! üôè

For those quantities, sourcing from China wouldn't make sense for you right now. Shipping alone would cost more than the products themselves.

**Here's what I'd suggest instead:**
- Check local craft stores or online marketplaces (Amazon, Shopee, Lazada, Daraz ‚Äî depending on where you're based)
- They'll have starter kits with wicks, molds, fragrances, and jars bundled together ‚Äî usually $20-40 for everything you need

When your candle business grows and you're ready for bulk orders (100+ units per item), that's where we shine ‚Äî we'll get you factory-direct pricing that beats retail by 40-60%. üî•

Wishing you the best with your candle journey! Come back anytime when you're ready to scale. üí™
